entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #48336
  • Allow parametrizing `_blazor/initializers` location in `Blazor.start()` #48335
  • OkObjectResult with generic type parameter #48324

Closed

  • .net8 preview 4: Hosting environment not detected via Blazor-Environment header #48271
    8.0-preview5
  • Quick grid does not render in .net 7 blazor server project #48292
  • Blazor Server App suddenly throws error in blazor.server.js: Range Offset is outside the bounds of the DataView #48216
  • Consider not using the wall clock time for timeouts in Kestrel #13628
    Backlog
  • Onboard aspnetcore into the new TimeProvider type from runtime #47472
    8.0-preview5
  • Quarantining StreamPool_Heartbeat_ExpiredStreamRemoved #37862
    Test failures
  • VariableLengthIntegerHelper returns incorrect value on consumed parameter #48203
  • RequestDelegateGenerator fails to detect route pattern that uses a constant for its value #48307
    8.0-preview5
  • Blazor - Cannot implicitly convert type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.ElementReference' when upgraded to VS 17.6.0 #48327
  • Support all ProblemDetail types in the multi response types for generating swagger docs MinimalApi #47623
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging by overriding ToString #39792
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr
  • Add some notes on testing trimming #48333
    area-infrastructure
  • DO NOT REVIEW Stress test x509 test #48332
    needs-area-label
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • [blazor] Read appsettings loaded by the runtime into the VFS #48326
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview5
  • HttpContext debugger display tweaks and fixes #48321
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `2bc2374` to `3881d5a` #48329
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb2941f` to `cb455a7` #48330
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Add debug output to HttpContext and friends #48293
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • Remove static analysis for route parameter in RDG #48320
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview5
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #48243
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #48207
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add a test confirming that X509Certificate is trimmed #48295
    needs-area-label, area-hosting
  • Update JSInProcessObjectReference.cs #48287
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Enable Blazor Server and WebAssembly components to run in the same document #48294
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Add new Blazor Web Template #48285
    area-mvc
  • explicitly identifying button type in QuickGrid columnbase #48277
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Update discovery APIs and automatically configure the endpoints based on the discovered RenderModes #48283
    area-blazor
  • DisableInferBodyFromParameters in RDG. #48269
    area-runtime, feature-rdg, 8.0-preview5
